name: OnlyFap Simulator
storyline: The main character decided to increase her income with the help of an intimate website. I bought a camera for high-quality content, created my account and started working. Subscribers quickly began to subscribe to the heroine, thus her earnings soared several times. After each completed level, the gamer will be rewarded with a reward in the form of a 3D image with a peculiar image and 3D animation of a sexual nature.
summary: OnlyFap Simulator is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to make a post. After each level an amount of post becomes higher, and you need to hire manager and do analytics to build a huge fan base
